content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * skill level very easy materials berroco zap 50 grs 3 hanks a berroco zoom 50 grs 1 ball b crochet hook size 10 00 mm worked with 2 strands a and 1 strand b held together shown in four different colorways 1 coordinates with ann scarf 2 1 http //archive berroco com/exclusives/ann_zhivago/ann_zhivago html 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ann-scarf
